content.rendered:
smoother for longer? our waxing services are here to get you fuzz-free, fast. with our soft and trademarked hard waxes, we’re all set to get any area smooth—from face to toe.

  • bye-bye bumps

    less irritation with our custom wax

  • clinically clean

    all the best protocols—and we never double dip, ever

  • safe and speedy

    top-notch service by our esthetic experts

body

waxing services for body
* book (V) for vulva or (P) for penis

book now canada
book now usa

the brazilly® wax

our signature brazilian wax service! everything off — or almost everything, you decide.
20 min
(V) / (P)

the brazilly® virgin wax

our signature brazilian wax service, but tailored to first-timers. we explain each step, and switch from side to side (so you won’t be lopsided if you want to stop) — we even tell you when to breathe!
30 min
(V) / (P)

the bikini wax

just the sides and a little off the top
10 min
(V) / (P)

the thongkini® wax

deep into the sides and top, and between the cheeks
15 min
(V) / (P)

the bumkini® wax

aka. the full-bush brazilly®, it’s a bikini (the sides + a little off the top) plus any strays between the cheeks
10 min
(V) / (P)

the bum-cheeky wax

bum cheeks only
10 min
(V) / (P)

the full-leg wax

from upper thigh to ankles and toes (does not include bikini)
35 min

the half-leg wax

bottoms or tops, you pick—plus toes for both. (bottom of leg extends to the top of the knee; top of the leg includes bottom of the knee to top of the thigh)
20 min

the underarms wax

trust us—you’ll never want to shave your pits again
10 min

the full-arm wax

baby-smooth arms all the way
20 min

the half-arm wax

above or below the elbow—you decide
15 min

the chest wax

the full zone from neck to just past the belly button.
20 min

the full-back wax

we’ve got your back, from beltline to neck and your shoulders too!
20 min

the half-back wax

upper or lower back, your pick. (upper includes shoulders; lower goes from mid-back to belt line)
15 min

the tummy wax

no more treasure trail
10 min

face

waxing services for face

book now canada
book now usa

the brow shape wax

tidy up the middle, underneath and tops—with trimming, too
15 min

the lip wax

you guessed it: the full upper lip
10 min

the chin wax

sides + bottom of chin area
10 min

the sides of face wax

hello, super-smooth facial skin
10 min

the nose wax

yep, inside your nostrils (once you do it, you’ll never go back)
10 min

the ear wax

along the sides and in the ear
10 min

the full-face wax

do it all: full brows, lip, chin and sides of face
35 min

faqs

what’s the difference between a bikini vs brazilian wax?

a brazilian wax involves removing all of the hair from the pubic region, including the front of the pubic bone, the insides of your cheeks, and everything in between. at THE TEN SPOT®, our signature brazilly® covers the intimate area (p or v) and between the cheeks, but we’ll happily make adjustments based on what you’re looking for.

a traditional bikini wax gets rid of the hair in the groin area at THE TEN SPOT®, we offer three different bikini-style waxes: the bikini, the thongkini®, and the bumkini®. with our bikini wax, we remove hair from the sides and a little off the top. the thongkini® service goes deep into the sides, off the top, and between the cheeks. the bumkini®, aka the full-bush brazilly® involves a traditional bikini wax, plus the removal of any strays between the cheeks.

how should i prepare for my waxing appointment?

first things first, do not shave. you need at least a quarter-inch of hair for the wax to grip onto. it’s also a great idea to exfoliate beforehand (but not right after). give the area a scrub the night before so that dead skin and ingrown hairs don’t fight against the wax.

you can also take an over-the-counter pain reliever like ibuprofen about 30 minutes before your appointment if you’re worried about pain. we also sell a numbing cream that can help a lot. just don’t try to numb things with an alcoholic drink—it’ll make the wax hurt more.

we recommend dressing comfortably for your appointment so that, afterwards, you can let the freshly waxed skin breathe in something loose.

how long should the hair be for waxing?

you need at least a quarter-inch of hair for the wax strips to grab hold of during your apppointment. that’s about the length of a grain of rice or maybe an eyelash (a real one), but it’s okay if you grow it out even longer. and if it’s your very first brazilian or bikini, don’t worry if you’re hosting a full bush—our skilled estheticians will trim to the perfect length for waxing. just take our word on this: do. not. shave.

does waxing hurt?

while we do our best to make waxing as comfortable as possible, we can’t tell you how much pain you’ll feel. pain is a relative thing, and how it’s felt is as unique as you. you can always take an over-the-counter pain reliever like ibuprofen 30 minutes before your appointment, and/or try a numbing cream (we sell a great one!). if you’re worried about how painful your waxing will be, talk to one of our staff. they’re happy to help ease your mind or determine whether waxing is the right choice.

can i still get waxed if i have my period?

if it’s that time of the month, no worries you can still get your brazilly® or other bikini wax done—just wear a tampon/menstrual cup during your service.

what medications should i avoid for waxing?

make sure you are not on any vitamin a medications (including retin-a, renova, isotretinoin, differin, accutane or other acne medications). these medications weaken the skin and may cause it to tear.

should i exfoliate after my wax?

don’t exfoliate your skin for 24 hours—it deserves a break! but once a day has gone by, frequent exfoliating and moisturizing helps prevent ingrown hairs. exfoliating every second day is a good routine to get into.

should i avoid sun after waxing?

just-waxed skin tends to burn more easily, so you’ll want to avoid exposing your newly-smooth region to sunlight for a day or two (and always wear spf, of course!).

can i shave between waxing appointments?

one of the most important bits of post-wax care is to not shave. we know it sounds counter-intuitive, but shaving can make your future waxes less effective, waxing on a 4 week cycle ensures any new growth comes back thinner and softer!

that’s not because shaving makes your hair grow back more quickly (that’s a myth we have to refute quite often). rather, it’s because at any given point, your hair follicles are all at different points in terms of their growth. some are long enough to wax, some are just about poking through the skin and others have just shed their hair.

when you wax, you remove hair that’s long. the next time you wax, you’re removing a different set of hair that’s just grown in. with regular waxing, you’ll end up having longer and longer periods between treatments and more sparse hair re-growth.

how long does a brazilian wax last for the first time?

after your first wax, you can expect to see very slow and minimal hair growth during the first week or two, but it will become more noticeable during the third and fourth week. this varies depending on your hair type and how fast it grows, but if you’re wondering how often to get a brazilian wax, the answer is generally to expect that you’ll need to come back about 4 weeks after your first treatment.

with regular waxing, most people find their hair regrowth slows down over time. so as long as you’re attentive when it comes to brazilian waxing aftercare and regular appointments, you’ll be able to go longer between appointments.
